channel.title: "(OWNER:______) has logged in!"
channel.description: This is a pretty cool thing that I figured out but the only bad thing is that I haven't... Figured it out... MAYBE YOU CAN HELP! What I want is a really cool idea [in my opinion,] and I just have to learn how... I want it to tell EVERYONE: "The owner has logged in!" when I log in. For instance, I log in, and say 5 or 6 people are on my server, it tells them: "Owner Valiken has logged in!" Please help {you help just by posting!}

item.title: "(OWNER:______) has logged in!"
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Under case 121, add this:

if (playerName.equals("your-name")) { //replace your-name with your name, exact to case
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged on!";
}

You’re welcome.

Oh, and Bryanc, please stop trying to help, you’re going to confuse them with your ignorance.

Read full topic
